nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The value that you provided for the Marker request parameter.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If IsTruncated is true, this element is present and contains the value that you can use for the Marker request parameter to continue listing your invalidation batches where they left off.

nested_items.name: MaxItems
nested_items.description: The value that you provided for the MaxItems request parameter.

nested_items.name: IsTruncated
nested_items.description: A flag that indicates whether more invalidation batch requests remain to be listed. If your results were truncated, you can make a follow-up pagination request using the Marker request parameter to retrieve more invalidation batches in the list.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The number of invalidation batches that were created by the current Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains one InvalidationSummary element for each invalidation batch created by the current Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique ID for an invalidation request.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time that an invalidation request was created.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of an invalidation request.
